sentences.sentence: In 1968, the US Supreme Court decided in favour of the evolutionists.
sentences.translation: 1968年，美国联邦最高法院最终支持了进化论者。

sentences.sentence: Both Creationists and Evolutionists agree that if evolution is at all possible, there needs to be an excessive (if not infinite) amount of time.
sentences.translation: 创造论者和进化论者双方都同意：如果进化是可能的，则需要有一个很长的(如果不是无限的)时期。
